title: Big Machines
description: Big Machines introduces the reader to machines that are used to do heavy construction work. The book provides photos and names of the machines and describes various settings and uses.
highFrequencyWords: barge, cargo, concrete, container ships, crane, excavators, machines, resources, trailor
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
comprehension: Consonant Digraphs : Identify digraph th in words
grammar:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
